textContent: Tricks are spells so efficient and that require so little mana that they can essentially be cast using the mana all around us, in the ground, air, etc. However, casting these spells implies a physical effort to gather all that mana and to cast the spell
title: Reason for Tricks
textContentHtml: Tricks are spells so efficient and that require so little mana that they can essentially be cast using the mana all around us, in the ground, air, etc. However, casting these spells implies a physical effort to gather all that mana and to cast the spell
